code: export function bubbleSort(array){var animations=[];bubbleSortHelper(array,animations);return animations;}function bubbleSortHelper(array,animations){var end=array.length-1;while(end>=1){for(var j=0;j<end;j++){if(array[j]>array[j+1]){animations.push([j,j+1]);animations.push([j,j+1]);animations.push([j,array[j+1]]);animations.push([j+1,array[j]]);var temp=array[j];array[j]=array[j+1];array[j+1]=temp;}}end--;}}
